creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
3 poems:
(Tishi no nada
Koete nodokeki
Michishio ya
Kumedomo tsukinu
Haru no akebono)
by Wasuitei Naone
(Sonare taru
Kani mo moshio wo
Kumu oke ni
Utsuru hatsuhi ya
Senkin no haru)
by Yamato Watamori
(San no kishi
Shio nare koromo
Nure iro ni
Musubi sake taru
Aoyagi no kami)
by Dondontei
markings: Drum mark(of Taiko-ren circle) sealed in red
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Shuihuzhuan of Women’s Customs: From 108 Figures (Fūzoku onna Suikoden, ippyakuhachinin no uchi 風俗女水滸伝　壹百八人ノ内)
title: Chōō [Zhang Heng]; Five-sheet print of Collecting Brine, no. 4
